summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1674, for the improvement of Thorndyke Avenue, beginning at the end of the present grade south of Grand Boulevard; thence southerly to the south line of West Howe Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, curbing and laying cement sidewalks and water mains, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 17688, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection of said assessment.
